channel.title: Projects on Denis Mittakarin
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Denis Mittakarin

item.title: pf-scamscan
item.description: A CLI tool that detects new Pump.fun token launches and flags potential scams using real-time image analysis.

item.title: X Tracker
item.description: A lightweight terminal app that monitors X (Twitter) follow activity in real time and sends alerts via Discord or Telegram.
